document_data.name: Brothers and Sisters of the Quill
document_data.mainbody: The '''Brothers and Sisters of the Quill''' were an order of [[wizard]]s and [[scrivener]]s of [[Thoth]] in [[Mulhorand]]. These priests and wizards were charged with retrieving lost knowledge and protecting the secrets of their nation in the lands beyond Mulhorand's borders.<ref>
